title: Ticket #1611: VM gahp invoking priv-sep switchboard without full pathname
description:
When the VM gahp invokes one of its helper scripts via priv-sep, it launches the switchboard with execvp(), giving it the basename of the switchboard binary (i.e. not the full path to the file). As a result, the switchboard binary is looked for in the path. This could result in the binary not being found or a wrong one being used.

The full path of the switchboard binary is available and should be used.
